name: One Click Wonder
description:
Do you perform well under pressure? 

Do you thrive when the stakes are high? 

Do you get a sadistic kick knowing that you could erase all your progress with a split second blunder?

One Click Wonder is a puzzle/action/adventure game.

Your first objective: Get to the finish without cracking under pressure.

Your REAL objective: Get to the finish with ONLY ONE click. 

Made by ya boy Jackson Nexhip for the GMTK 2019 Game Jam.
